titles.title: To authorize the provision of community adjustment and economic diversification assistance in connection with the closure of Homestead Air Force Base, Florida.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Research and Technology.

bill.summary: 5/6/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Defense to provide community adjustment and economic diversification assistance to Florida and local governments in Dade County, Florida, in connection with Homestead Air Force Base. Authorizes FY 1994 appropriations.
